features: Patented MagLatch hardware for secure top access
Dual side entry for easy access to anything in the bag
Adjustable dividers to organize and protect gear
Dedicated laptop storage (up to 15" screen on the 20 liter and 16" on the 30 liter)
Dedicated tablet storage (up to 11" screen for both size bags)
Expandable side pockets to fit water bottles and tripods
Hidden lashing straps to carry bulky items
Weatherproof exterior zips and 500D nylon canvas shell keep gear dry
